summary: CIA counterintelligence chief (1954-1974) - paranoid mole hunter, alleged UAP briefing recipient
key_facts: OSS Italy WWII, recruited Klaus Barbie
Alleged MJ-12 member or UAP program knowledge
Led destructive mole hunts, paralyzed Soviet operations
Fired 1974 after internal paranoia damaged CIA
concealment: Extreme compartmentation, paranoid operational security, destroyed files
